Articles.Content:
KSS
KERBIN SPACE STATION

Stock KSP 1.4/ MH 1.2
no mods required

A compilation of short missions from and to the KERBIN SPACE STATION, a series of kerbalised adventures in Kerbin low orbit.
Execute various tasks like launching Koyuz TMK, the Space Shuttle and deorbiting them back to the Dessert launchsite!
Experience missionaborts, accidents and precision rendezvouz, guided ascends, and ground recovery procedures!
 

Vessels crafted with detailed functions and balanced handling, if you ever struggled with building a working Space Shuttle in KSP, look here how the orignal works and follow the instructions how to perform a perfect Shuttle launch guided by Wernher von Kerman.
The KSS orbits Kerbin at around 75km and roughly 45° inclination, launch ahead the station because catching up from lower orbit to rendezvouz takes alot more time than from above.
I hope some of you enjoy this set of missions with a approximate unaccelerated ingame time between a half to one hour, or more if you take it slow. Scoring system starts at dedicated events, no hurry to achieve the missiongoals.

KSS - Missions:

- Decouple the Koyuz transporter from the KSS and deorbit to the Dessert Launchsite, recover the crew by truck or airplane, and bring Peggy Kerman to the Medic Center located aside the Airfield due to severe snack deprivation. Earn a medal for timely arrival at the Medic Center...
DropBox download: Crewrotation Part 1 (Version 1.1)

- Launch the Koyuz TMK and dock to the KSS. Adjust your heading to match the ascend trajectory marker properly, or see what happens if something goes wrong...
DropBox download: Crewrotation Part 2  

- Launch with the Space Shuttle to the KSS and dock to the front docking port. Sounds easy, and it is, if you follow Wernhers instructions . Earn a medal for a timely rendezvouz and docking maneuver...
DropBox download: Shuttle launch and docking (Version 1.1)

- Deorbit the Space Shuttle, aim for a nice landing at the Dessert Airfield and enjoy the pleasure of gliding concrete flowercrates! Consider yourself a true KSP Pilot if you can hit the runway and stop the Shuttle with the brakechutes... 
DropBox download: Shuttle deorbit and landing (Version 1.2)

Screenshot gallery
 

Spoiler

Edited May 30, 2018 by Mikki
I'll have to try this, looking at that shuttle landing... I've landed 6/7 of my recent SSTO planes on the runway, and the failure is only because I ran out of fuel to deorbit and overshot by 100km.
